resources.string:
"Tumia Kikuza Sauti pamoja na vipokea sauti vinavyobanwa kichwani ili uboreshe jinsi unavyosikia sauti zilizo karibu nawe. Kikuza Sauti hufanya sauti hafifu zisikike vizuri bila kuongeza viwango vya sauti ambazo tayari ziko juu.
Chomeka vipokea sauti vinavyobanwa kichwani ambavyo vinatumia waya, kisha uanzishe Kikuza Sauti."
